did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Vice President for Research and Advanced Studies records, 1961-1998.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Office of the Vice President for Research and Advanced Studies.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes records concerning research and research proposals in various academic departments and study centers at Cornell University, including the Center for International Studies, the Center for Radiophysics and Space Research, and others; includes files of Franklin A. Long.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes records concerning research and research proposals in various academic departments and study centers at Cornell University, including the Center for International Studies, the Center for Radiophysics and Space Research, and others; includes files of Franklin A. Long.

Also, the records of the Assistant Vice President for Research and Outreach, Lucinda Noble. They include correspondence, reports, minutes, publications and subject files. This office existed from 1994-1998 with Norman Scott as the Director.

accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of office of origin. (Box 8 not restricted)
